Ready when you are!  Welcome to the ease and simplicity of Reservationless phone & web conferencing. You can now host your virtual meetings 24x7x365 because they will be completely automated. You can begin using the conferencing services immediately with your permanent dial-in numbers and entry codes below. In 5 to 10 business days you will be receiving by mail your personalized wallet card and pocket user guide. Please call us at 1.888.203.7900 with any questions.

 

    

 

Phone Conferencing

Dial-in numbers and entry codes

  • Dial-in Number:  [dialinNo.tollfreeno] or [dialinNo.tollno] for international callers
  • Chairperson Entry Code:  [account.cec](#) for you
  • Participant Entry Code:  [account.pec](#) for everyone else

To begin a phone conference

  • Invite your Participants. Give them the date/time of the conference, the Dial-in Number, and Participant Entry Code.
  • At the designated date/time, enter the Dial-in Number from any telephone. At the prompt, key in your Chairperson Entry Code. Participants join in exactly the same fashion, only they use the Participant Entry Code.

Chairperson commands

  • This is a partial list only. See the Users Guide attached or www.infiniteconferencing.com/guides for a complete list.
      *0  Summon an operator
      *5  Lock/Unlock the conference entrance
      *6  Mute/Unmute your own line (Participants can use this command also)
      *7  Mute/Unmute everyone but yourself

Additional commands

  • The following commands for dial-out capability are additionally available upon request (turned off for new accounts by default).
      #3  Enter dial-out mode. At dial tone, enter phone number then #
      #4  Abort dial-out and return yourself to conference
      #5  Return yourself and dialed-out party to conference

 

 

 

Additional Information:

Notes

  • Reservationless phone & web conferencing support up to 100 people (connections) by default. Upon request this limit may be set higher or lower.
  • To make reservations for larger conferences or those with special requirements please call our Customer Service department at 1.888.203.7900 or 1.973.671.0040.

Refer a friend or colleague
